====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{n-g|Particle indicating the word preceding it is used as an adverb.}}
#: {{zh-x|很 快 地{de}|very quickly}}

=====Usage notes=====
* The use of this particle is always optional after polysyllabic adverbs.
*: {{zh-x|非常 短|very short}}
*: {{zh-x|非常 地{de} 短|very short}}
* On the contrary, monosyllabic adverbs are compulsorily used with or without {{lang|zh|地}}.
*: {{zh-x|很 漂亮{liang}|very beautiful}} (where *{{lang|zh|很地漂亮}} is unacceptable)
*: {{zh-x|倏地{de} 不見|to disappear suddenly}} (where *{{lang|zh|倏不見}} is unacceptable)

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|じ|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=じ}} {{m|zh|地|tr=dij<sup>H</sup>}}. The [[呉音#Japanese|goon]] reading, so likely the initial borrowing. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} ''dì''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=go|じ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR|acc2=0|acc2_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|じ|hhira=ぢ}}

# [[earth]], [[dirt]]
# [[fabric]], [[cloth]]
#* {{RQ:Botchan}}:
#*: {{ja-usex|いくらか薄い'''地'''には相違なくっても暑いには極ってる。|いくら か うすい '''じ''' に は そうい なくって も あつい に は きまってる。|However thin the '''cloth''', flannel is flannel and must have been pretty warm at that time of the year.}}
# {{lb|ja|game of go|sort=し'}} [[territory]]

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|ち|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ち}} {{m|zh|地|tr=dij<sup>H</sup>}}. The [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]] reading, so likely a later borrowing. The devoicing of the initial consonant might indicate a dialectal source. Compare modern {{etyl|hak|-}} ''thi'', {{etyl|nan|-}} ''tī''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=ko|ち|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ち}}

# [[earth]], [[land]], [[ground]]
# a [[place]], a [[region]], a piece of land
# [[territory]], [[dominion]]
# {{qualifier|of a crate, etc.}} the [[bottom]]

====Suffix====
{{ja-pos|ち|suffix}}

# [[place]], [[area]]

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|つち}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=つち}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

# the [[ground]]
# the [[earth]] {{qualifier|as opposed to the heavens}}
# the [[ground]] or [[bottom]] of something {{qualifier|as of a price range}}
